ygData.subject: Re: [archive-crawler] Re: java.lang.NullPointerException  at (Reader.java:61)
ygData.msgSnippet: This is a known bug that slipped into 3.0.0 and is fixed for the (coming soon) 3.0.1: https://webarchive.jira.com/browse/HER-1725 In the meantime, a workaround

Subject: Re: [archive-crawler] Re: java.lang.NullPointerException  at (Reader.java:61)
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=137285340; y=cOlRvUywUoJWNxXq1FKtbcMtQUzmBzZZdrR4jmGwnChb
X-Yahoo-Profile: gojomo

This is a known bug that slipped into 3.0.0 and is fixed for the (coming 
soon) 3.0.1:

https://webarchive.jira.com/browse/HER-1725

In the meantime, a workaround -- starting from the 'default' that's 
already placed in the usual jobs directory -- is described in the 3.0.0 
release notes:

https://webarchive.jira.com/wiki/display/Heritrix/Release+Notes+-+3.0.0#ReleaseNotes-3.0.0-%22Createnewjob%22givesNPE

Or, as you note, the adventurous can grab a development "3.1.1-SNAPSHOT" 
build (which tracks the code that will actually become "3.0.1").

- Gordon @ IA

Bernd wrote:
> Similar to part of my problem "not building jobs".
> I tested it yesterday also with ubuntu 9 and Sun JRE 1.6 and
> had the same trouble. It turned out that it is not the JAVA 6 
> version, but the Heritrix 3.0.0.
> Don't know why they have a buggy Heritrix 3.0.0 online for download.
> May be we should try 3.0.0-RC1 or the latest 3.0.0_SNAPSHOT?
> 
> You have to use the 3.1.1_SNAPSHOT. 
> It worked for me with Ubuntu 9 and Sun JAVA 6.
> 
> Bernd
>
